parameters:
Alright, I've made it a triple bottom. Even if they know
about it, they definitely shouldn't be able to find it...

\SE[37]Well, well... I sometimes wonder why I'm putting in
so much effort like this... \SE[38]It's also troublesome to
be criticized by that person...

\SE[14]In other words, that guy is doing whatever he wants
too much! Next time, I definitely won't let him understand!!
\SE[13]I swear on my dignity as a man...!!
Hey... Ryan.......... Is it okay if I come in...?

\SE[2]...Oh, it's Rebecca...? \SE[3]It's not a problem,
but...

\SE[12]... Your complexion doesn't look good, huh? \!\SE[13]
Could it be that you're not feeling well...?

\SE[51]W-Well, it's not like that...? \SE[50]I'm always
energetic... so...?

\SE[57]...Don't push yourself. It's the first time I've seen
you looking so unwell. \!\SE[58] Do you even realize how you
look right now?

\SE[53]What kind of face do I have... Well, it's cute... and
adorable, and charming...

\SE[38]Oh, ahaha... I see, I got noticed so easily. \SE[35]I
thought I was hiding it well though...

\SE[52]We've been together for a long time, so I understand
that much. \!\SE[12]...For now, why don't you lie down and
rest for a bit. Once you've calmed down, let's talk to
Lunaroa-san or Vega- san about it.

...I'll carry you to the bed. Don't complain about me
touching weird places, okay?
I-I won't say it... Something like that...
A princess carry...? Surprisingly, you're strong...

Well, I've been training a bit. Aren't you too light? You're
too concerned about your body shape, you're not eating
properly, right?

Alright. Well then, I'll call someone, so just stay quiet
and go to sleep there.

W-Wait... Just a little longer, stay with me... please... I
feel lonely and sad...

...I understand. Just for a little while, okay? Geez, you're
always so selfish...

I... I want to become stronger. Truly... to the point where
I can protect everyone...
